related_questions.question:
9. Alucard : What do you think about our new classroom?    Ruby : ......... We need to clean it.
a. I think it's too small
b. I
c. I think it's very dirty
d. I
The text below is for question number 10 - 15
M​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

C. I think it's very dirty.

Penjelasan:

Ruby menjawab.... Kita perlu membersihkannya. Maka untuk mengisi jawaban yang tepat adalah I think it's very dirty yang artinya kurasa kelasnya kotor.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question: Bu Sri meminjam uang dikoperasi sebesar Rp.6.000.000 dengan bunga 18% setahun jika lamah meminjam 12 bulan .maka berapakah total pinjaman yang harus bu sri bayar kepada koperasi ?pakai jalan y plis ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

Penjelasan:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

semoga membantu^•^

related_questions.question:
3. They ____ studying for the test two days ago    a. was
b. were
c. do
d. Does
4. Dudi _____ optimistic about the project yesterday.
a. war
b. wer
c. do
d. does

bantu jawab lagi kakak Besok ujian saya mau di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jawabannya adalah:

3. B. Were

4. A

Jawaban yang nomor 4 itu mungkin typo yang sebenarnya "Was" jadi "War"

related_questions.question:
Rudi is a junior high school student. He goes to SMP 13    everyday. He goes to school on foot (jalan kaki).
Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu..

Jawaban:

29. A. A Student

30. B. SMP 13

31. D. On Foot

32. C. Yes, He Does

related_questions.question:
Good morning. Allow (ijinkanlah saya) me to introduce    myself (memperkenalkan diriku). My full name is Fina
Natalia but you can call me Lia. I was born in Batam on
Nevember 24 th, 2006.
I am the second daughter of three children. My father
has two daughters (putri) and one son (putra). I love
listening music and singing. Would you like to my house
sometime? I live at joyoboyo street number 13. I love
studying here very much, thank you.

a. Fina

c. 15
d. 16

does she have?

b.4
c. 3
